description: The young civilian who becomes the pilot of the prototype http://anidb.net/ch1577 [Strike Gundam]. Kira is a first-generation Coordinator whose parents are Naturals, and his family has taken refuge in the neutral territory of the resource satellite Heliopolis to avoid the war. However, Kira finds himself drawn into the conflict when Heliopolis is attacked by http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT] forces, and he remains aboard the http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance] warship http://anidb.net/ch1507 [Archangel] in order to protect his friends and loved ones. As a Coordinator, Kira has remarkable mental and physical abilities, and his computer programming talents enable him to rewrite the http://anidb.net/ch1577 [Strike Gundam`s] operating system in mid-battle to adapt to new combat conditions.
name: Kira Yamato
